basic_info.headline: Product Manager — Checkout Growth | Conversion, Risk, UX

experience.title: Product Manager, Checkout
description: Raised checkout conversion +15% via simplified forms and async risk checks.
Partnered with Risk to cut false positives −8% using dynamic scoring.

experience.title: Associate PM
description: Consolidated KYC APIs; time‑to‑verify −28%; abandonment −6% with clearer states.
Piloted document retry; pass‑through +5pp in Gen‑Z cohort.

description: Modeled onboarding & fraud events; prioritized fixes saving ~1.2s latency.
